movie.title: Gods and Generals
movie.plot: The film centers mostly around the personal and professional life of Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, a brilliant if eccentric Confederate general, from the outbreak of the American Civil War until its halfway point when Jackson is killed accidentally by his own soldiers in May 1863 during his greatest victory.

movie.title: Haber
movie.plot: At the brink of World War I, Fritz Shimon Haber was Germany's greatest chemist. Haber's Nobel prize-winning synthetic fertilizers saved world's population from mass starvation. But as World War I broke out killing millions of German soldiers, the desperate German forces asks Shimon Haber to provide the army with new kind of weapon.  Haber has already sacrificed his and his family's Jewish identity in order to become a respectable German citizen. With his decision to invent such a weapon, Haber was the first scientist in human history to unleash a weapon of mass destruction. Later he paid the ultimate price for his ambition as his wife Clara committed suicide and his invention was used for murdering millions of Jewish people during World War II.

events.title: Leo Demidov raises the Soviet flag on top of the Reichstag

movie.title: Child 44
movie.plot: Set in Stalin-era Soviet Union, a disgraced MGB agent is dispatched to investigate a series of child murders -- a case that begins to connect with the very top of party leadership.

movie.title: J. Edgar
movie.plot: As the face of law enforcement in the United States for almost 50 years, J. Edgar Hoover was feared and admired, reviled and revered. But behind closed doors, he held secrets that would have destroyed his image, his career, and his life.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 16 nominations.

events.title: The General Belgrano is sunk in the Falklands Islands

movie.title: The Iron Lady
movie.plot: A look at the life of Margaret Thatcher, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, with a focus on the price she paid for power.

movie.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movie.plot: Harry, Ron and Hermione continue their quest to vanquish the evil Voldemort once and for all. Just as things begin to look hopeless for the young wizards, Harry discovers a trio of magical objects that endow him with powers to rival Voldemort's formidable skills.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins & 91 nominations.

movie.title: Zero Dark Thirty
movie.plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L. Team 6 in May, 2011.

events.title: Molly Bloom pleads guilty and avoids a prison sentence

movie.title: Molly's Game
movie.plot: Molly Bloom, a young skier and former Olympic hopeful becomes a successful entrepreneur (and a target of an FBI investigation) when she establishes a high-stakes, international poker game.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 50 nominations.
